title: August 8th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: August 8th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from discussing controversy surrounding Beyonce's new album, Renaissance, to Dane Cook's engagement. See below for the topics of the week:


Beyonce's Renaissance Album Update

  • Beyoncé Removes ‘Milkshake’ From ‘Energy’ After Kelis Called Her Out for ‘Theft’
  • Beyonce removes Ableist slur from “Heated” after backlash
  • Monica Lewinsky wants Beyoncé to remove lyric about her from 'Partition'



Ne-Yo Infidelity

  • Ne-Yo's wife files for divorce and says he had a kid with another woman



Kardashian Family Update

  • Kylie Jenner fires back after scientist goes after her for "Unsanitary" lab photos
  • Kim Kardashian and Pete Davidson break up after 9 months together
  • Khloe Kardashian and Tristan Thompson welcome their second child



Dan Cook Engaged

  • Dane Cook Is Engaged To His Girlfriend Kelsi Taylor And The Couple Definitely Started Dating When She Was A Teenager





Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
